name: mri_morphology
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: MRI Morphology Tool - performs various morphological operations on a volume.

inputs.description: Input volume file on which operations are to be applied.
inputs.name: Input Volume

inputs.description: Morphological operation to be performed. Options include: open, close, dilate, erode, mode, fill_holes, erode_bottom, dilate_thresh, erode_thresh.
inputs.name: Operation

inputs.description: Number of iterations to apply the operation.
inputs.name: Number of Iterations

inputs.description: Output volume file to store the results of the operation.
inputs.name: Output Volume

inputs.description: Only apply operations to the specified label instead of all nonzero voxels.
inputs.name: Label Option

output-files.description: The result of the morphological operation applied to the input volume.
output-files.name: Output File
